title: Miley Cyrus appears to give away a Masked Singer spoiler
text:
Cody Simpson may have just given himself away as a contestant on The Masked Singer, admitting he's in Australia for a secret project.

After being spotted arriving at Sydney Airport on Monday ahead of the highly secretive show's finale on Monday night, the 22-year-old shared a live video of himself chatting with his new girlfriend, Miley Cyrus.

'Where am I? You're not allowed to know where I am actually...' he began, seemingly answering a question asked by a fan.

Scroll down for video

Oops: Cody Simpson may have just given himself away as a contestant on The Masked Singer, admitting he's in Australia for a secret project. Pictured chatting with girlfriend Miley Cyrus

Miley, 26, then interrupted, confirming Cody had flown into Sydney for a secret project despite his best efforts to hide.

'Well, they already know where you are, because somebody got you at the airport,' she added.

Appearing shocked, Cody asked Miley how she knew that, before he conceded, 'there was, like, 1000 paparazzi'.

Speculation: It's widely believed he is The Robot on the show, and the character will be unmasked on Monday night's episode

The star was seemingly keen to keep a low profile as he arrived at the airport dressed in dark clothing and a beanie.

It's widely believed he is The Robot on the show, and the character will be unmasked on Monday night's episode.

Contestants on The Masked Singer participate in media interviews the morning after their identities are revealed, which perhaps explains Cody's visit.

'Where am I? You're not allowed to know where I am actually...' he began, seemingly answering a question asked by a fan during his live chat with Miley

Last week, The Robot performed a mash-up of two of Miley's hits: Nothing Breaks Like a Heart and Jolene, which was originally recorded by Miley's godmother, Dolly Parton.

Cody was last in Australia in July, which happened to be when The Masked Singer was being filmed at Sydney's Fox Studios.

Continuing his chat with Miley, Cody confessed he was having a hard time being away from his girlfriend.

Coincidence? Cody was last in Australia in July, which happened to be when The Masked Singer was being filmed at Sydney's Fox Studios

'I want to come home already... I don't like it when I'm away,' he told her.

Miley said it was their first time apart in 'four weeks', and she was finding the separation 'painful'.

'We didn't do a minute apart before I left,' said Cody, claiming it would be another 'week' before they were reunited.
description: Cody Simpson may have just given himself away as a contestant on The Masked Singer, admitting he's in Australia for a secret project, after being spotted arriving at Sydney Airport on Monday.
authors: Demeter Stamell For Daily Mail Australia
